thread.title: Israeli troops kill Palestinian near Gaza border - health officials

title: Israeli troops kill Palestinian near Gaza border - health officials
text:
May 15, 2018 / 2:12 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago Israeli troops kill Palestinian near Gaza border - health officials Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
GAZA (Reuters) - Israeli forces killed a Palestinian near the Gaza border on Tuesday, local health officials said, as Palestinian protesters turned out in smaller numbers than on Monday, when dozens were killed by Israeli gunfire.
The 51-year-old man was fatally shot along the frontier in the central Gaza Strip after thousands of Palestinians took part in funerals for Mondayâ€™s dead. Reporting by Nidal al-Mughrabi; Writing by Jeffrey Heller in Jerusalem
